document.full_text: ms. taymor will speak during the annual conference of theater communications group, a national organization of nearly 700 nonprofit theaters and affiliated groups, four days after the $70 million musical is scheduled to have its long-delayed opening night.
document.title: just after 'spider-man' reopens, taymor to deliver theater conference keynote
lines_and_colors: ms. taymor will speak during the annual conference of theater communications group, a national organization of nearly 700 nonprofit theaters and affiliated groups, four days after the $70 million musical is scheduled to have its long-delayed opening night.
